    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_94177</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94177</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Drag force slows things down</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenkraftkraft verlangsamt Sachen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La force de résistance à l'avancement ralentit 
des choses vers le bas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A força de arrasto retarda coisas para baixo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La forza di resistenza ritarda le cose giù</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δύναμη έλξης επιβραδύνει τα πράγματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La fuerza de fricción retarda cosas abajo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the fall speed of a sky diver with and without a parachute. A parachute slows things down due to air resistance or drag force.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air resistance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drag force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">free fall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parachute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parachutist</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sky diver</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht die Fallgeschwindigkeit
eines Himmeltauchers mit und ohne einem Fallschirm. Ein 
Fallschirm verlangsamt die Sachen wegen des Luftwiderstandes oder der 
Gegenkraftkraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare la vitesse de chute 
d'un plongeur de ciel et sans à un parachute. Un parachute 
ralentit des choses vers le bas dues à la résistance d'air ou à la 
force de résistance à l'avancement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara a velocidade da queda de
um mergulhador do céu com e sem um pára-quedas. Um 
pára-quedas retarda as coisas para baixo  devido à resistência do 
ar ou à força de arrasto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta la velocità di 
caduta di un tuffatore del cielo a e senza i paracadute. I 
paracadute ritardano le cose giù dovuto resistenza dell'aria o la 
forza di resistenza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει την ταχύτητα πτώσης ενός
δύτη ουρανού με και χωρίς ένα αλεξίπτωτο. Ένα αλεξίπτωτο 
επιβραδύνει τα πράγματα λόγω στην αντίσταση αέρα ή τη δύναμη 
έλξης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara la velocidad de la 
caída de un zambullidor del cielo con y sin un paracaídas. Un 
paracaídas retarda las cosas abajo  debido a la resistencia del aire 
o a la fuerza de fricción.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luftwiderstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gegenkraftkraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geben Sie Fall frei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fallschirm</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
